info.task: read information about empty expanded combobox
info.title: Read information about an empty, expanded combobox in interaction mode

setupScript.name: moveFocusToAndExpandCombobox
setupScript.description: sets focus on and expands the Combobox

user: With focus on the combobox, read information about the combobox.
instructions.raw: With focus on the combobox, read information about the combobox.
instructions.mode: If NVDA did not make the focus mode sound when the test page loaded, press Insert+Space to turn focus mode on.

assertions.expectation: Name of the combobox ('State') is conveyed
State of the combobox (expanded) is conveyed
The ability to enter or edit text is conveyed
The presence of autocomplete behavior is conveyed
